column1: The three accused appellants (hereinafter referred to as the appellants) had been
1)  Conspiracy to abduct the victim, against all three,
2)  Abduction of the victim to commit rape against 2nd and the 3rd appellant,
3)  1st appellant aided and abetted the 2nd and the 3rd to commit the offence
4)  A charge of rape against the 1st appellant,
5)  A charge of rape against the 2nd appellant,
6)  A charge of rape against the 3rd appellant,
7)  Murder of the victim against all.
